main event: A bright object, the size of a dime, was observed moving slowly to the east and then straight up.
interesting points: The object changed color from white to red,The object appeared to emit a vapor in the rear,The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes,The observer was a captain from the Pecos Police Department,The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were clear with no winds.
witness description: Captain from the Pecos Police Department
